certification.text: Copy the certification request link and send it to your registrar

register.address_help: The address of the user you are creating an instrument registration for

pay.wrong: Something went wrong with your payment

Metadata.title: Instruement
Metadata.description: Secure your musical instrument with a digital identity. Keep absolute control of your certificates and ownership.

DraftGrid.description: Instruments pending registration completion. You can save changes and finish later.

NFTGrid.description_single: View the instrument and initiate its property transfer to the new owner.
NFTGrid.description_plural: View all the instruments and initiate their property transfer to the new owner.

title.new_sub_heading: Complete these steps to register your instrument
title.edit_sub_heading: Continue completing the steps to register your instrument
title.ready_to_register_sub: You can now preview and register your instrument

type.label: Instrument type
type.description: Available options reflect your endorsed construction skills
type.type_set_description: To set a different type create a new draft
type.description_modal: When registering an instrument, you can choose from instrument types that correspond to your endorsed construction skills. For example, if you have the "Violin construction" endorsement, you'll see "Violin" as an available option in the dropdown menu. This ensures that each registered instrument reflects your verified expertise as a luthier.

name.label: Instrument name
name.description: Choose a meaningful name for your instrument
name.description_modal: Choose a meaningful name for your instrument. This will help you identify it later.

cover.title: Cover
cover.description: Primary image of the instrument. Accepts JPG and PNG format

images.title: Images
images.description: Register a minimum of two additional images of views and details of the instrument. No need to upload again the cover image. In JPG and PNG format

files.title: Documents
files.description: Register additional documents in PDF format. Documents are optional.

description.title: Text
description.description: Detailed description of the instrument. This text will be available to the public.

images.text_area_placeholder: Add a description for this image

files.text_area_placeholder: Add a description for this document

Instrument.you_are_not_owner: You are not the owner of this instrument
Instrument.you_are_owner: You are the owner of this instrument
Instrument.transfer_management_description: As the owner of this instrument, you can transfer the ownership of the asset to a different account.
Instrument.in_person_transfer_description: For maximum security and speed, transfer the instrument while both parties are present
Instrument.remote_transfer_description: Transfer the instrument at a distance by sharing a secure link with the recipient
Instrument.step_1_description: Ask the recipient to open the Instruement app on their phone. If they don't have it yet, share a direct link.
Instrument.step_2_description: Scan the QR code on the recipient's home or account screen.
Instrument.step_3_waiting_for_scan: Waiting for QR scan result. No rush.
Instrument.step_3_description: Finally, transfer the record to the scanned account
Instrument.step_1_remote_description: Copy and share a secure link with the recipient. Use your preferred messaging app.
Instrument.step_2_remote_description: The recipient will open the link and immediately see the button to copy the transfer acceptance link. They must share that link with you.
Instrument.step_3_remote_description: Open the acceptance link to see the final send button.
Instrument.remote_transfer_confirmation_valid_descr: To proceed, copy and share the transfer confirmation link with the owner of the instrument.
Instrument.remote_transfer_confirmation_invalid_des: Please review the transfer link or contact the owner of the instrument to get a new link.
Instrument.remote_transfer_step_3_description: You can now transfer the instrument to the new owner.
Instrument.remote_transfer_step_3_invalid_descripti: The transfer link is invalid. Check the received link and try again.

AirdropForm.title: Register your first instrument
AirdropForm.subtitle: For free because the first time is always the hardest

ConsentSection.terms_consent: I have read and agree to the Terms of Use governing my use of this service.
ConsentSection.privacy_consent: I consent to the collection and processing of my data as outlined in the Privacy Policy.

PaymentResult.success_message_received: Your payment for "{title}" has been received. You can wait a few moments or check your email for the confirmation.
PaymentResult.success_message_received_airdrop: Your free registration for "{title}" has been received. You can wait a few moments or check your email for the confirmation.
PaymentResult.success_message_ready: The registered instrument is now available in your account
PaymentResult.failed_message: Something went wrong with the payment. We have been notified and will contact you shortly.
PaymentResult.processing_message: Please wait while we process your registration.

share_account_what.title: Your account address
share_account_what.description: The QR code contains your account address. This address allows you to receive instrument registrations securely, as it only works for incoming transfers. You can share it with luthiers and other users to receive registered instruments in your account. Once a registration is transferred to your account, you will be the sole owner of that registration.

OnboardMinterCard.title: Activate your luthier account now
OnboardMinterCard.description: Proceed to confirm the email where you received your invitation.
OnboardMinterCard.confirm_invitation_email_description: We will send you a verification code to this email
OnboardMinterCard.privacy_policy: I have read and agree to the
OnboardMinterCard.reload_notice: Note: on successful validation, the page will reload and you will need to sign-in again.

errors.otp_failed: Something went wrong with this step. Please try again.

PWAInstall.title: Add Instruement to your home screen
PWAInstall.description: Enable direct access to your registered musical instruments for a more convenient use

ios_dialog.title: Add Instruement to your home screen
ios_dialog.step2: Swipe up and tap Add to Home Screen

User.no_instruments_sub: Show the QR code to the luthier or current owner to receive the instrument registration.

Minter.hello_sub: we welcome you to our simple but powerful digital tool for Luthiers. In our quick introduction video you will learn how to register your first instrument.
Minter.register_text: As verified luthier you can register instruments of your endorsed skills

NotConnected.heading: Tell the true story about your musical instrument
NotConnected.sub_heading: Keep absolute control of your certificates and ownership

User.connect_button_description: Click the account button to access all core and advanced account functions. If you haven’t already exported and saved your private key, you should do it now!

Minter.wallet_actions_description: Access all account functions here. If you haven’t already exported and saved your private key, you should do it now!
